languages.text: "Поверить не могу. Соломон, да ты музыкант! Как ты мог скрывать это?!"
"I can't believe it. Solomorne, you're a musician! How can you hide such talent?"
languages.original_text: "Поверить не могу. Соломон, да ты музыкант! Как ты мог скрывать это?!"

traits.locale_text: "I can't believe it. Solomorne, you're a musician! How can you hide such talent?"
"I can't believe it. Solomorne, you're a musician! How can you hide such talent?"
"I can't believe it. Solomorne, you're a musician! How can you hide such talent?"
"I can't believe it. Solomorne, you're a musician! How can you hide such talent?"
"I can't believe it. Solomorne, you're a musician! How can you hide such talent?"

languages.text: 「信じられないな。ソロモーン、君は音楽家だったのか！どうしてそんな才能を隠していられたんだ？」
languages.original_text: "I can't believe it. Solomorne, you're a musician! How can you hide such talent?"

traits.locale_text: 「信じられないな。ソロモーン、君は音楽家だったのか！どうしてそんな才能を隠していられたんだ？」

languages.text: "Ich fasse es nicht. Solomorne, Ihr seid ein Musiker! Wie könnt Ihr so ein Talent verbergen?"
languages.original_text: "I can't believe it. Solomorne, you're a musician! How can you hide such talent?"

traits.locale_text: "Ich fasse es nicht. Solomorne, Ihr seid ein Musiker! Wie könnt Ihr so ein Talent verbergen?"

languages.text: « Je n'en crois pas mes oreilles ! Solomorne, musicien ! Pourquoi cacher un tel talent ? »
languages.original_text: "I can't believe it. Solomorne, you're a musician! How can you hide such talent?"

traits.locale_text: « Je n'en crois pas mes oreilles ! Solomorne, musicien ! Pourquoi cacher un tel talent ? »

languages.text: «No doy crédito. ¡Solomorne, es usted músico! ¿Cómo se le ocurre ocultar semejante talento?».
languages.original_text: "I can't believe it. Solomorne, you're a musician! How can you hide such talent?"

traits.locale_text: «No doy crédito. ¡Solomorne, es usted músico! ¿Cómo se le ocurre ocultar semejante talento?».

languages.text: “我简直不敢相信，你简直是个音乐家，索罗蒙！你这么有才华，为什么要掩饰起来呢？”
languages.original_text: "I can't believe it. Solomorne, you're a musician! How can you hide such talent?"

traits.locale_text: “我简直不敢相信，你简直是个音乐家，索罗蒙！你这么有才华，为什么要掩饰起来呢？”

languages.text: "İnanılır gibi değil! Solomorne, müzisyensin ha! Böyle bir yeteneği nasıl saklayabildin?"
languages.original_text: "I can't believe it. Solomorne, you're a musician! How can you hide such talent?"

traits.locale_text: "İnanılır gibi değil! Solomorne, müzisyensin demek! Böyle bir yeteneği nasıl sakladın?"
